statements: SELECT * FROM ad_targeting;
SELECT user_id, ad_category FROM ad_targeting WHERE ad_clicks > 100;
SELECT ad_category, ad_clicks FROM ad_targeting WHERE user_id = 5;
SELECT * FROM ad_targeting ORDER BY ad_id DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_data, ad_category FROM ad_targeting WHERE ad_clicks < 50 ORDER BY ad_clicks ASC, user_id DESC;
SELECT * FROM ad_targeting WHERE user_id = 101 AND ad_clicks > 5 ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC, ad_id ASC;
SELECT ad_category, COUNT(*) as ad_count FROM ad_targeting GROUP BY ad_category HAVING ad_count > 1;
SELECT user_id, SUM(ad_clicks) as total_clicks FROM ad_targeting GROUP BY user_id ORDER BY total_clicks DESC;
SELECT behavior_data FROM ad_targeting WHERE behavior_data LIKE '%interest%' AND ad_category = 'Sports';
SELECT ad_category, AVG(ad_clicks) as avg_clicks FROM ad_targeting GROUP BY ad_category HAVING avg_clicks > 3;
SELECT * FROM ad_data WHERE ad_id = 1;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ad_data WHERE ad_category = 'Technology';
SELECT ad_id, ad_name, ad_cost FROM ad_data WHERE ad_cost > 1000;
SELECT ad_id, ad_category, ad_clicks FROM ad_data ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC;
SELECT ad_name, ad_cost FROM ad_data WHERE ad_cost BETWEEN 500 AND 1000;
SELECT ad_name, ad_type, ad_cost FROM ad_data WHERE ad_clicks > 100 ORDER BY ad_cost DESC, ad_name ASC LIMIT 5
SELECT ad_name, ad_category, ad_clicks FROM ad_data WHERE ad_type = 'Banner' ORDER BY ad_clicks DESC LIMIT 10
SELECT ad_id, ad_category, ad_cost, ad_clicks FROM ad_data WHERE ad_cost < 500.00 ORDER BY ad_category ASC, ad_clicks DESC
SELECT * FROM ad_data WHERE ad_name LIKE '%Product%' AND ad_category = 'Electronics' ORDER BY ad_id ASC
SELECT ad_name, ad_type FROM ad_data WHERE ad_cost BETWEEN 50.00 AND 100.00 ORDER BY ad_name DESC
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY user_id ASC;
SELECT DISTINCT behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data;
SELECT timestamp, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type = 'click' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, targeting_score FROM ad_targeting WHERE targeting_score > 0.5;
SELECT * FROM user_behavior_data;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type, timestamp FROM user_behavior_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT user_id, behavior_type FROM user_behavior_data WHERE behavior_type='click';
SELECT campaign_id, campaign_name, start_date, end_date FROM ad_campaigns WHERE end_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY start_date;

SELECT ad.campaign_id, ad.campaign_name, target.user_id, target.behavior_type, target.targeting_score FROM ad_campaigns ad JOIN ad_targeting target ON ad.campaign_id = target.campaign_id ORDER BY target.targeting_score DESC;
SELECT * FROM user_profile;
SELECT name, age FROM user_profile WHERE gender='Female';
SELECT campaign_id, name, budget FROM ad_campaign WHERE budget > 1000;
SELECT user_id, action, timestamp FROM user_interaction ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT campaign_id, name, start_date FROM ad_campaign WHERE start_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-03-31';
SELECT name, age, gender FROM user_profile WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY age DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT name, location FROM user_profile WHERE gender = 'Female' AND location = 'New York';
SELECT campaign_id, name, start_date, end_date, budget FROM ad_campaign WHERE budget > 1000 ORDER BY start_date;
SELECT u.name, a.name AS campaign_name, a.start_date, a.end_date FROM ad_campaign a JOIN user_profile u ON a.campaign_id = u.user_id;
SELECT MAX(age) AS max_age, MIN(age) AS min_age, AVG(age) AS avg_age FROM user_profile;
SELECT * FROM users;
SELECT user_id, username, email FROM users WHERE age > 30;
SELECT user_id, username, email, age, gender FROM users ORDER BY age DESC, username ASC;
SELECT user_id, city, country FROM user_location WHERE country='USA';
SELECT ad_id, category, target_age_lower, target_age_upper FROM ads_targeting WHERE category='Fashion' AND target_gender='Female';
SELECT * FROM users WHERE age > 30 ORDER BY username DESC;
SELECT username, email FROM users INNER JOIN user_preferences ON users.user_id = user_preferences.user_id WHERE category = 'Sports';
SELECT user_id, target_gender, target_age_lower, target_age_upper FROM ads_targeting WHERE category = 'Electronics' AND subcategory = 'Computers';
SELECT page_visited, click_count, interaction_time FROM user_behavior WHERE user_id = 123 ORDER BY interaction_time DESC;
SELECT city, country FROM user_location WHERE timezone = 'PST' OR timezone = 'CST';
